item.name: Black Beast Grease
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
A fatty tissue collected from the skin of a soul-eating beast.
By repeatedly refining it through distillation and purification, it turns into a high-quality magical resource.

"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
A highly pure crystal of magic created
when human history crosses a stream of Mana.
It can be said that it is the ingredient for materializing Heroic Spirits.

noblePhantasms.name: Sanat Kumara
noblePhantasms.detail: Deal heavy DEF-ignoring damage to all enemies ▲ & decrease DEF (3 turns) <effect increases with Overcharge> & Critical Rate (3 turns) <effect increases with Overcharge> & Debuff Resist (3 turns) <effect increases with Overcharge> for all enemies

comments.comment:
A 19th century female occultist and the founder of Theosophy.
She married a Russian noble at a young age, but immediately ran away to make herself known in the world of magecraft. Commonly known as Madame Blavatsky.
She believed in the existence of the lost continent of Lemuria, and devoted herself to the study of the Mystics. She made contact with higher-dimensional beings known as the "Mahatmas," and their collective body "Hierarchy," gaining much wisdom in the process.
Perhaps she has seen for herself the possibilities of reaching the Root.

Height/Weight: 145cm, 38kg
Origin: History
Region: Europe
Alignment: Chaotic-Good
Gender: Female
Her favorite country is India. The organization she hates is the SPR (The British Society for Psychic Research).

A genius mage, born out of a sudden mutation.
She called her predecessors who had reached the Root as "Mahatmas" and "Hierarchy," and defined (assumed) them to be extradimensional beings.
Helena herself constantly felt their messages, but for others to feel the same thing, the same talent as her (a specialized magical circuit) would be needed.

There is a high possibility that neither the Lemurian continent nor the Mahatmas existed, and she was "simply a genius with her own unique interpretation of the world."

As a Servant, due to her role as the founder of Theosophy, she materializes as an all-purpose Caster who can use many different types of magecraft, from ancient to modern.
She can use ancient Egyptian spells and even Baptism Rites, but she's not used to utilizing ancient magecrafts.

Item Construction: B
Allows her to create magical tools.
Whenever she materializes, she creates multiple copies of an automatic doll modeled after Colonel Olcott, her right-hand man in life. She uses them as servants to run errands for her. By the way, they're not very useful in battle.

『Sanat Kumara』
Rank: A
NP Type: Anti-Army
Range: 1-50　Maximum Targets: 150
Venusian God, Heavenly Lord of the Flame.
A flying object reveals itself and attacks the area.
She calls it "a hidden technique of Theosophy that temporarily recreates the power of Sanat Kumara (Defender Demon Lord), the deity that came from Venus to Earth, and one of the gods who created the world!"
But any information about the flying object is unknown.

She has a lot of wishes for the Grail, supposedly.
There's so many that she says she can't narrow them down to just one, but whether that's true or not is unknown.
...You are really nothing but unknowns, Mrs. Blavatsky.
"Don't you think mysterious women are great? Wait, I mean, there's only one truth, which humanity can't know, but everything is known by the Mahatmas!"

voiceLines.name: Birthday
voiceLines.subtitle:
What do you want for your birthday?
How old are you anyway?

voiceLines.name: During an Event
voiceLines.subtitle:
Is that the Mahatmas' voice?
I can feel them. I can't just stand around here!

voiceLines.name: Conversation 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
My purpose in life is to search for the truth!
Come, let's go!

voiceLines.name: Conversation 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
Master and Servant?
Ohh... I'm the Servant, huh?

voiceLines.name: Conversation 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
I don't like calling you Master.
Oh, no, it's not like that. It's because to me the Mahatmas are my masters.

voiceLines.name: Likes
voiceLines.subtitle:
It's not that I like dolls.
I love this doll because it's Olcott! 
You should address him as Colonel!

voiceLines.name: Dislikes
voiceLines.subtitle:
What do I hate?
The SPR, obviously! I'm sure people from the Clock Tower are involved too...

voiceLines.name: About the Holy Grail
voiceLines.subtitle:
The Holy Grail...
The wish-granting chalice, I wonder if its origin is from Dagda's Cauldron, or maybe...

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
I'll teach you anything.
Old things, new things, I know everything☆

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
Contemporary and modern magecraft, I created it all. Really, I did...
I swear.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
They call me Mrs. Blavatsky.
I really hate being called "Mrs." I mean, I ran away the second I got married.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
Get divorced? I would have if I could. But I couldn't.
...Yep, that was the age I lived in!

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
...Hm? My life? I always looked like this. What about it?
I can tell you all about it if you want. But once you hear my secrets, you better not run away!

voiceLines.name: Conversation 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
Oh, I see.
Nursery Rhyme. Children's stories huh?
...So what?
Are Dodgson's works really that popular?

voiceLines.name: Conversation 6
voiceLines.subtitle:
Hm...
There's a Caster who's knowledgeable about magecraft?
I'd LOVE to have a long talk with them...

voiceLines.name: Conversation 7
voiceLines.subtitle:
An Indian Heroic Spirit is here!
Wonderful. India is like a second home to me... No, it's more like my soul's home.
I do so hope we can become friends!

voiceLines.name: Conversation 8
voiceLines.subtitle:
Mr. Doyle isn't a bad person by any means, but he is associated with the SPR...
Yes, of course.
I know that's not Mr. Holmes's fault.

voiceLines.name: Level up
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 502300_0_G010]One step closer to Mahatma!

voiceLines.name: Ascension 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 502300_0_G020]I sense something greater than myself.
[id 502300_0_G021]I suppose this way isn't so bad.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 1
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 502300_0_G030]I suppose this is it.[id 502300_0_G031] What do you think?

voiceLines.name: Ascension 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 502300_0_G040]Ta-da! I dressed myself up in a Lemurian style.
[id 502300_0_G041]Does it suit me?

voiceLines.name: Ascension 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 502300_0_G050]It's not so bad being a Servant.
[id 502300_0_G051,502300_0_G052]I can sense the Mahatmas, and I've got you, a new disciple... [id 502300_0_G053]Oh, could you grab that book for me?

voiceLines.name: Summon
text: [r]This Caster will guide you along the way!
voiceLines.subtitle:
...It's all right.
This Caster will guide you along the way!

voiceLines.name: Attack 1
voiceLines.subtitle: First light!

voiceLines.name: Attack 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Second light!

voiceLines.name: Attack 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Stars!

voiceLines.name: Extra Attack
voiceLines.subtitle: By the wisdom of Serapis!

voiceLines.name: Skill 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Very well.

voiceLines.name: Skill 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Leave this to me!

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Please, stay out of my way.

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
I'll teach you anything you want to know.
That is, if you survive.

voiceLines.name: Victory 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
Over already?
Aww...

voiceLines.name: Victory 2
voiceLines.subtitle: You've gotta work up a sweat sometimes, right?

voiceLines.name: Damage 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Aah!

voiceLines.name: Damage 1
voiceLines.subtitle: What is this!?

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 1
voiceLines.subtitle: No way, no way, no way...

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Olcott...

voiceLines.name: Command Card 1
voiceLines.subtitle: That card, huh?

voiceLines.name: Command Card 2
voiceLines.subtitle: If you insist.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 3
voiceLines.subtitle: All right.

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm Card
voiceLines.subtitle:
Very well.
I'll give you something special!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 502300_0_B050]Lemuria slumbers in the seas! 
[id 502300_0_B051]Hierarchy graces the skies! 
[id 502300_0_B052]And I stand upon the earth! 
[id 502300_0_B053]Sanat Kumara!
